price: Ó sọ pé: “Àwọn nìwọ̀nyí tí wọ́n ń tọ orípa mi bọ̀ (lẹ́yìn mi). Èmi sì kánjú wá sọ́dọ̀ Rẹ nítorí kí O lè yọ́nú sí mi ni, Olúwa mi.”
arabic: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla hum ulāi ʿalā atharī waʿajil'tu ilayka rabbi litarḍā
